In-Ear Earphone Demonstrates Unique Charisma

With the development of city, the city's noise pollution problem is getting worse, facing this circumstance, the headphones become the focus of the market, which have better effect of soundproof outdoors for they use the passive noise reduction technology. wholesale iTouch card Trend You Should Not Omit AKG`s K321 is a headphone, which is fashion and simple. The new K330 is very attractive, and the design of which is very stylish. K330 has two colors of silver and yellow. It is believed that it must get popular with the younger consumer groups after to be listed.Choices of wholesale Dual SIM Cell Phone

K340 is also one of the nearly released products, the same in-ear style; its mould is familiar with K330, despite different color. It appears to be the same shell mold with K330, unit and cavity tuning is different.Put on on , Enjoy the best wholesale CycloDS TF card

K360, which is a newly released product by AKG, is quite characteristic. Come to Buy Must-Have wholesale Nunchuck Controller for Wii ! They Are Now at the Most Competitive Price! This headphones' design is just like an earring. This kind of design has not similar products at the present market, so it can create a milestone in the history of headphones. Not trying the real one, the actual wearing effect remains unknown.Britney Spearsâ€™s Wholesale Electronics , Take a Look and Make a Comment

Among all headphones launched this time, the model number of the top type is 370, which possessed natural and simple shape and adopts the color match of siler and black, looking fashionable and handsome. In the face of the city's noise pollution, only with passive noise reduction technology, this is powerless. The new released K390NC is a headphone product using active noise reduction, this headphone use the external noise reduction device to deal with the noise, the noise reduction box is designed very nice, and it looks more lightweight, easy to carry. In addition to headphones products, there are a large number of headphones products the released by AKG, which are mainly used to outside listening.

First I introduce K420, it is different in design with the old style headphone products like K414P and K416P, the design is very light, which supports the folded design and is easy to carry from the photos. K430 is updated from K420 model with the same design.The color of earflaps is differnt, and the sound performance should be somehow enhanced. K430 has an independent version, which is K430 Apple, seen from the product model, it should be developed for Apple products.

From the appearance, the main difference with the K430 is mainly reflected in the color of the earmuffs and the design of the first beam. There is another back-hang headphones K435. The design will not affect the hairstyle of the users. K435 appears energetic in designing and has the youthful consumer group.The new product of K480NC has the active noise canceling design, and adopts clubbed denoiser. Inside the headphone, is the padding sponge, which will lead to more comfortableness and better sound insulation effect.

Due to exposure to this information of the product is from the AKG website, and we don't see new objects, the pricing of the product is unknown, the above products is mainly for appearance introduction. Only from the product design perspective, AKG's new products have big breakthrough, which do not use public known appearance of mold, but new design. The appearance has a strong sense of the times to meet the needs of the modern consumer. Only from this point of view, AKG's progress is very clear.

Through other means, we have got some unverified information which claims that apart form the new headphone products introduced in this text, AKG will launch numerous new products in the near future, over 60 types in all. From the new products, it explains that AKG will not exit headphone market, but it has a bright future in the aspect. The professional headphone, earphone and portable headphones are like three carriages, which lead the mainstream of consumer market. From the sound, AKG`s ability is qualified and respected, with the outstanding appearance of the new products, it will have good Market competitiveness.

The pricing of these products is another important consideration, it should be depends on Harman AKG how they expect. Take the low-price strategy with substantive new outputs to increase the market share, or pursuit profits by high pricing products to show the brand value of AKG, the fine asset of the Harman Group? All depend on the market strategy of the Group.

From the standpoint of the headphone industry, this progressive movement by such a prevalent brand as AKG would certainly trigger the chain reaction within the industry, the other brands will either speed up their product updating to compete with AKG or reduce their price to augment the market share, either way the ultimate beneficiary would be the consumers.

Classic Brand AKG New Arrivals Preview

Every type of product has several brands, but these brands have their own position according to their different strength. It is the same in the headset market, in the many brands which have released their headphones, Sennheiser, AKG, Goethe and Beyerdynamic are called the first four headphone brands, of course, some headphone fans have their own first four brands in their minds under their preferences. Sennheiser headphones is the most influential brand in world headphone market, launched the first vitor baia power of dynamic headphones and receiver, and has outstanding contributions in audio area.Wardrobe Essentials for Cuties

From the United States, with his music of Goethe's understanding, launched many infectious headphones products. 5 Principles You should Break Originated in Austria, the town of music, AKG also has strong capabilities in headphone developing, its products have got a high valuation both in professional field and civil lovers. The protagonist is one of four brand topped the headphones for earphone products more AKG concern for this brand of friendly unfamiliar. Hey! wholesale cyclods-evolution are the Favorites of People in Santiago There are numerous classical earphone products brought out by AKG. Many products are still very popular after several years they were put into the market, the legendary K1000 especially becoming the dream in the mind of numerous top fanatics. Over past years, AKG maintained low-pitched, and its market actions are few. Some of AKG brands have faded out of people`s sight.Carnival Gift Ideas for Mother

In 2007, the news, the headset brand of noble family is American haman, haman group acquired JBL group and haman's card two brands foray into the headset market. JBL and Haman Kardon got the technics support of AKG, their production were quite same as AKG. At that time fans provoked much discussion to guess whether AKG would withdraw gradually the headphone market.

In 2008, AKG declared that it would stop many classical production, it made many fans more worried. But from the first half year, AKG introduced an alternative model for discontinued products, new products were introduced into the market, this gradually dispel people's concerns. In the golden autumn, there was news from AKG that a large number of new products ware released, including earplugs and headgear earphones. They were much different from the previous products in design and had a large quantity, which made people quite astonished.

Now we introduce the products AKG releases newly. It seems from AKG official website that only the earphones products have released 13 new types this time. As to K309, such headphones adopt traditional wearing way, and its outline design is novel (adopts middle-end thin outline), which brings good visual effect to people.

K311 was released based on K309, whose shape is somewhat similar to that of K309, but its design in ear panel is different. As to product model performance, K311`s sound level is higher than that of K309. In addition, K313 is newly marketed, but its design on earplugs` outline is comparatively low-pitched. Also, its outline is simple. The K313 is released in two colors from now on, brown-red and green to facilitate consumers to choose with their own preferences.

The model higher than K313 is K315 which has nearly the same sculpt, but it adopt the arrangement of gray and red brown which looks more low-pitched. From their shapes, the type is different, from where we could notice that K315 playback effects is better than K313's.

Recently sport earphone is hot in the market, listening to music while exercise has become a fashion now. Among the new products that AKG released this time, there are also earplugs developed for sports, for example K316. Its ear plugs have ear hanging part which ensure firm wearing effect, and are convenient for use while doing sports. Thereafter, K317 was marketed, and such headphones are a traditional wearing product. The earplugs` outline adopts three colors, and it will reflect metal light from the effect picture, which is more beautiful.

According to relevant data, the highest model of traditional worn earplugs is K319, and such earplugs represent AKG`s highest strength in traditional worn earplugs. The updating rapid of traditional wearing earplugs is relatively slow recently, and the new products that AKG released this time has added new vitality to this market.

Original Nintendo Sells for 13000USD on Ebay

Did old electric consuming products cost nothing? The deal on auction website eBay recently surprised you a lot. A mother from North Carolina of America auctioned a Nintendo FC plus five game cards at the price of 9.99 dollars which altogether sold as high as 130,000 dollars. Only an old-styled Nintendo FC was not worth so much money, but the five game cards sold at the same time meant a lot to game players. Those five games are [MVP Baseball", [Ninja Turtles 2", [Stadium Events", [Super Mario 3" and [Super Mario Brothers-mallard shooting". Those games are kept well and have complete packages. Among them, [Stadium Events" is the treasure to collect. It is said that this game had less than 2000 copies at that time, and now only ten of them were kept completely, and only one was unpacked.The Most Welcomed Gift of <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/cz-bangles">cheap Cubic Zirconia bangles</a> Are Displayed, Get one Piece!

This game was developed by Bandai Company in Japan and introduced to North America by Nintendo in 1987. Afterwards, it was sold again at the name of World Championships in Athletics, which made Gymnasium Events become a Nintendo game most hardly to find. The mother wrote when she sold out these things, [For years, I keep these games for my children to play when they grow up. However, replacement of electronic products is too frequent, and the kids want to play the new games of their own. He said: [I feet pity that the power line and video cable of the computer have lost. According to reports, Nintendo released the launch schedule of 3D handheld game console without special glasses. The company hopes to catch the wave of 3D with it. Nintendo said that it would be the new game console for 3DS of Nintendo and it would be put into the market next March. Nintendo with Sony and Microsoft is actively seeking for billions of dollars worth of electric console market pie.

It has been revealed that 3DS will possibly use [parallax barrier" technology and also be equipped with new 3D vibration controller. Besides, there's another saying that 3DS would apply the technology of Zebra Imaging.

This company indicated that this play station would replace Nintendo DS series and would be compatible with DS games. DS series is the best selling game console with its sale of more than 125 million ever since its inception in 2004. Nintendo declined to mention its price, but they guarantees to reveal more information of it on the annual [E3 electronic product exhibition" in June this year. The popular Wii game console is also the product of Nintendo`s.

Apple Lasts Dreams by IPad

When Apple launched iPad this weekend in the United States, it will intrigue to two different responses. In the List of Most Amazing Picks, <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/dstt">cheap DSTT</a> are in the Leading Place The television news will focus on the long queue out of the sell shop of Apple and the desire of Apple fans toward this kind of bright and attractive new technology products. 10 Information That Will Have Effect on Blemish to Your <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/dstt">cheap DSTT Card</a>

Meanwhile, the sceptics are pointed out, this kind of multi-function tablet PC market has been in heavy defeat. How to Tips Why is Apple still going to sell external old-fashioned keyboard for iPad if the touch screen is really revolutionary. No matter how much people want to acquire the new equipment, it is certainly not just another personal high-tech hardware. After all this iPad is the extension of the most important new development in computer since PC emerged.

If it is popular among the public, it will ensure that Apple boards on top of the computer industry againg. Apple introduced iPhone in 2007 followed by iPod Touch in the next year. It never gives up in seeking ways to change the interaction between people and intelligent portable equipment. Nowadays, touching had become the HMI, online App Store became the new sevice place where people get services and contains. In fact, iPhone and iPod Touch together represent the fastest growing new computer platform in the history. Through iPad, Apple extends an expansive new field for this platform. Past experience shows that the multifunctional-plate equipment was the Waterloo for lots of high-tech companies. However, Apple Tablet PC's develops wiht a higher starting point than others on the basis of iPhone. What is more, even the salesstatus of iPad below expectation, Apple at least sketches a large and promoting market for a smart of software developers.

One of the striking features of iPad is that it can easily integrate into the behavior of normal daily life. You do not start, even need not flip, you only need to watch the screen and touch several times lightly. Maybe iPad is not extremely portable like iPhone, it is very convenient. It is not only a simple and direct way to release orders, but also it has brought the fun of sensitivity-get the desired results by lightly hitting the equipment. These features are not unique to Apple, other electronic companies or Internet companies have been scrambling to copy. Maybe only need half of the time that developing ipad, there will be the similar type that competed with the iPad in the market.

The Company of Apple Will Sell Apple IPhone At Full Rates

Apple iPhone 3G is beginning to attract everyone's attention in the market recently, although this style of cell phone successfully fasinated everyone with itsmainstream performance and the wonderful shape design when it first hit the market. According to the media's report, some apple amateur has published an Apple Company interior memorandum on March 22. The Apple claims in the internal memo that it is plan to allow U.S. customers to buy Apple iPhone at full price at the premise that they do not sign service contracts with AT&T Company.Fancy <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/ez-flash">EZ flash vi</a> Welcomed

Given that iPhone is still in a locking state, the phone can't be used until AT&T`S some wireless services are subscribed even the customer buys iPhone in full price. But clients who buy Apple phone with full price need not to accord with the two-year using agreement stated coercively in AT&T/iPhone agreement. This supplies convenience for clients themsevles to choose compound wireless service business categories.The Soundest Gifts Ever: <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/protective-cases">Silicone Cases for iPhone</a> for Cashiers

In the memo of the [all employees", the Apple claimed that the customers can buy the iPhone in full price without accept the AT & T Inc. <a href="">flash memory card supplier</a> â€[ Are They Still Fashionable? service contract. And the 8GB iPhone 3G prices 499 U.S. dollars; 16GB iPhone 3GS 599 U.S. dollars; 32GB iPhone 3GS 699 U.S. dollars. And in the current U.S. market, iPhone 3G signing a two-year service contract with AT & T company is priced 99 U.S. dollars; 16GB iPhone 3GS mobile phone 199 U.S. dollars; 32GB iPhone 3GS 299 U.S. dollars. The market analysts believed that the action of the Apple Company's sell the iPhone handset with full price will compress further the AT&T Corporation's profit space of exclusive sell the iPhone handset.Paris Woman Enjoy

In the memo, Apple also mentioned two restrictive clauses, that is, each customer can buy only one full iPhone one day, each customer can buy at most 10 sets of full-price mobile phone. Top 10 Vouchers for Halloween There are mainly 2 reasons why iPhone customers, who can only choose AT&T's wireless service, give up the AT&T service contract and buy iPhone at full price. After you buy a iPhone at full price, you can choose to sigh a short-term service contracts with AT&T Company. In the future, after the Apple Company signed the cooperative agreement with other wireless serves operators, they can voluntarily choose wireless serves operators.

The analyst Michael Gartenberg of the market analysis enterprise Altimeter Group points out that the memo reveals a message with "ironic meaning". The customers who buy the iPhone of full price still need to sign an agreement with the AT & T Wireless Services Inc., which indicates that Apple's development of thinking has no substantive changes.

Last year, AT&T only sold iPhone with two-year sevice contract that does not need to sign to old customers. At that time, 8GB iPhone was 599 US dollars, 16GB iPhone was 699 US dollars. The experts speculated that Apple's action may presages that they may choose to sign sales agreement with other wireless operators after its exclusive sale contract with the AT & T expires.

Alluring Ornaments Gives Bliss And Sadness To Old People

When mentioned jewelry, many people may only connect it with young ladies or movie stars. The market investors also keep groups on the young who have the stronger consuming capacity, few someone pays attention to need of the old.Festivals Gift Ideas for OL

In fact, most elderly have changed their concepts of jewelry and has begun to pursue fashion. In major stores, jewelry counters are placed in a prominent position showing almost all of the season fashions: irregular geometry, the complicated shape of flowers, stunning metallic luster. Old people do not exclude fashionable jewelry. A well groomed old person who is over sixty still likes to wear jewelry, especially the necklace, as the same as she was young. She regards that by temperament one can be more attractive if wearing a suitable jewelry. She said most of her necklaces were made of pearls and pure gold, which were relatively simple and traditional. She holds that jewels of K-gold, platinum and etc. are very popular in jewelry market now and have a considerable market share. One reason may be their target consumers are youngsters and their designs are creative and fashionable. Though she never buys these, she likes to appreciate them before the counter in the supermarket.Protect on , Enjoy the best <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/ez-flash">EZ vi supplier</a>

Her views on fashionable jewelry are sufficient to represent the views of a large part of elderly consumers, since after all, only a few elderly consumers bravely try the fashionable elements. From this point of view, senior people are indeed hard to say I love you to fashion jewelry. They love beautiful things but there exists too many considerations.

The young value the process and designs of jewelry, while the elderly often pay more attention to the fashion of both preservation and emotional connotations. Accessories made of roby, sapphire and emerald are often favoured by the old, and some old "gentlemen' like wearing white jade pendants about their waist which apprear both classical and trendy. Jewelry design and manufacturers can start from the emotional content the old people put emphasis on to dig the characteristics of their demand in this aspect.

As a child, you can choose a suitable jewelry as a birthday gift to send to your parents. I believe that buying jewelry for birthday gifts for the elderly, not only unconventional, but also appealing to them. How many people will buy a piece of jewelry with the import of longevity to elderly people when they reach 60 complete years and 70 complete years?

The Third Version of Apple IPhone With 300 Million Pixels

The arrival of third-generation apple iphone 3GS become the focus in the mobile phone market once again, although there is no basic change in the appearance, just 2 grams heavier. Recession Chic â€[ How to Be Most Magnificent on a Budget But the comprehensive upgrade on the configuration aspect and the adjustment of the function details still make Apple fans expect very much. You See, <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/">China Electronics Wholesale</a> Sweep over the Fashion Trend of Dallas Seen from the suffix "S" of Apple which stands for speed, this time the third generation of Apple will bring the users much faster operation experience. Why Shia LaBeouf all Like <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/">China Electronics supplier</a> ? Who Knows!Give Your Opinion on Most Suitable <a href="http://www.volumerates.com/category/other-brands">cheap GSM Cell phone</a> for Mother

Iphone 3GS still use the classic big-screen straight panel design, the appearance of the framework remained the same as the former two generations, body measurements is still 115.5 × 62.1 × 12.3mm, but it is heavier only 2 grams reaching to the 135 grams. 11.6mm slim body is also very pleasing, the whole machine was undoubtedly the most visible piece of 3.5 inch 16.7 million color 320 x 480 resolution TFT touch screen, display an excellent job. Besides, the shell of iPhone 3GS use new painting, to some extend, it can be water, oil and fingerprint proof yet with the same bold and trendy body. The biggest upgrade of the new iPhone is that it supports 3G network, and it is reported that its speed is 2.8 times faster than that of the previous generation. In terms of the screen, there is no evident change in Iphone 3GS, it shares the same TFT touch screen with the first and second generation, the resolution of 320x480 pixels also remains the same, the display effect and the touch sensitivity maintain on a high level of Iphone standard.

The upgrade on device for iPhone 3GS would be very obvious. No only update the resolution updates from 2 million to 3 million. The new practical function of auto-focusing, touched-focus and auto white-balance shot may support the micro distance mode for smallest distance by 10 centimetres. And what is more, it could capture in VGA format, whose sampling rate can reach up to 30 frames per second. Besides of the upgrade d video camera, iPhone 3GS also get advanced in the performance. It inlay a CPU of the basic frequency up to 600MHz, while equipped with 256MB memory, it have greatly improved when compared with the second generation which is a combination of 400MHz and 128MB, the update of Apple is still very real.

iPhone 3GS added a e-compass function which actually equals to a compass. Supporting by the G – sensor function, as long as you put your phone horizontally, you can detect the accurate direction of all directions, with the movement of users, iPhone 3GS will turn its direction accordingly. It's much capable than traditional GPS, it's more direct and convenient in practice. The 3GS version of iPhone also supports the 7.2Mbps downlink HSDPA protocol, and also improved the battery standby capacity. Voice control function automatically calls through saying the name in the phone book or directly saying phone number, and it is useful for the friends who own cars.

The upgrade of iphone 3GS in function and configuration is obvious, with the speed of the operating software improved a lot, the combination of the latest hardware and the new firmware of iphone3.0 makes it more humane to operate. Iphone 3GS really brings us many surprises. As to the price, at present it is not long before this phone comes into the market and the goods resource so few that the price is a little high.

Tiffany Rings, Special Commitment of True Love

Nowadays, we both know that the spelling of the [ring" precisely means the [endless" of love, while actually, in ancient times, rings all over the world are also engraved with a lot of text full of affection. This Year, People all Choose EZ flash vi dsi Cell Phone Cases , the Common Decision of Auntie

[OMONIA" had been carved on Greece rings, which meant concordance.In France, rings with 'boone foi' inside means 'for us'.and in Italy, the word "fede" on rings was meant to express blessings.wholesale nintendo-wii , Top Halloween Gifting for Lovers

Since then, marriage is fated to have a long relationship with religion.In religion legend,the ring finger had a connection of heart.New people wore the ring around the middle finger to express the meaning of "Heart Linked".

During the period of 9 century, Pope Nicholas I of Rome said "ring is the proof of marriage," which is the oldest argument about the wedding ring.The custom of sending or exchanging rings in a wedding spread throughout the Europe aound 13 century,and the meterial also varied, especially gold and silver become the popular elementaries.

In the year 1477, Austrian duke Maksim Milan fell in love with the French princess Mary, the duke sent the princess his love token ,a ring, which had a round diamond decorated on it.The luxury and dazzling ring of course help the duke win the princecss's heart and marry her.Since then, the diamond wedding ring has been regarded as the symbol of a faithful marriage. And the custom that using a diamond ring as the love token has been widely spread all over the world ever since.

And the ring also becomes the most popular jewelry piece because of its special meaning.His all loving care are carved into this tiny Tiffany ring. Please remember the lifelong promise by your heart!We have promised each other to have sweet love all the life since the moment that we wear rings. And from now on, we say goodbye to the cold and lonely moon and never feel lonely in the night.

Manners About Maintaining Accessories Brand-new

Many points should be paid attention to keep your jewelries lasting freshness. Vintage-Inspired: Magnificent Jewelry

Not touch regularly: it seems to be easy to keep the jewelries on your body clear, but actually it`s not. The Best After- Sales:intelligence toys Many people can`t help fondling the surface of the gemstone when seeing them attractive. Follow Wonderful Tutorials to Buy Novelty toys from Jennifer Lopez In this way, the luster and luminance of the gemstone will be affected. How to Defuse It? China Electronics supplier can Help You Make It! Every now and then, our body evacuates perspiration and oiliness to the skin, which is most easily touched by hands. So the hands are often covered with oiliness from the skin. When touching jewelry with hands, the oil of hands is easy to stop on the surface of jewelry, and then influents the sheen and brightness of jewelry. Especially the diamonds belong to hydrophobic gems whose surface will easily contaminate the oiliness which will greatly affect the gloss. But the emerald and the white jade are assembly structures, if you often touch them, and they will look much more humid and lovely jade. Running water do harm to the luster of the pearls: some people want to clean and maintain them after wearing them a few times, but they don`t know that using running water to wash pearls do less harm to the pearls. But it must be forbidden to immerse the pearl in the main water. There is a certain Cl in the main water which will damage the lightness of the pearl. Actually mineral water is the best choice to immerse pearl. Besides, before sending the pearl to store in the strongbox in the bank after wearing, you need to wash and maintain it. However, the bank strongbox to warrant cash and documents is not suitable with the precious stones such as pearl which is in moist quality, because the moisture in the box is lower than the stones need. Therefore, the pearls need to be picked out and to immerse in water to add moisture.

Take jewelry off appropriately, that is maintenance: correct wearing jewelry should often take off or exchange according to the difference of people, situation, time, place and thing, but as to modern busy people, maybe there is no way. To remove it when washing hands for some soaps at various stages of alkaline matter will damage the frail pearls by gradual. Moreover, the soap many get stuck in the apertures of the rings, which will affect the luster and luminance of the diamonds greatly. And when you bath, do housework, swim and so on, you may damage the diamonds. Pay attention to materials consisting of acid and alkaline: there is a certain amount of acid or alkaline in some materials in our daily life. And these different concentrations of alkalinity and acidity chemical substances may hurt jewelry, especially pearl or other organic stones. The usage of daily makeup, you should avoid pollute jewelry.

Attention to the wearing order: Hooking clothes and wallets must be avoided when wearing jewels with rims or rings. In general, to wear the jewels after dressing one is the wearing order of jewels. You may image that you put on your prong setting single diamond ring firstly, and then put on your clothes and stocks. Is not that a dangerous thing to your clothes, stocks and your stones?

Magical effect of bringing a small bag to contain stones: you may have heard that someone take off the precious stones while washing hands and the stones fall down and get hurt. Or even someone left the precious stones on the wash platform. In fact it is not news but you can avoid of such dangerous things. When you buy an ornament, the jewelry shop will send you a small case. You may put your ornament in it to make it looked more beautiful. In fact, this small box can be used cleverly. It is small and doesn't take up much space, so you can take it with you when you go out and put the jewelry into the box when washing hands. If you have made the habit, you may decrease the opportunities to lose your precious stones. Therefore, you shall not feel trouble with bringing a small ring case with you!

Just A Mere Chance to Disclosure Fourth-Generation IPhone

Gizmodo release the news that the next generation of prototype iPhone is lost by Apple`s engineers had attracted keen interest of netizens recently. According to the strategies of PR, Apple did not mean it. Gizmodo thought that only had Apple subverted its strategies thoroughly, they may leak iPhone on purpose. In the past 10 years, Apple is the consumer products company with the most rigorous confidentiality in the world. When many large companies began to use the blog and the official Twitter account, Apple behaved still like a defence contractor information disclosure.acekard 2 Boots Before April Fools' Day

Correspondents, who have dealt with Apple`s public-relations team before, admit that it is difficult to get along with Apple. Top 10 Options for Christmas Eve Even from the good side, Apple is also too picky, and set many "absurd" restrictions for some simple request raised by journalists. From the bad side, Apple is not willing to respond the external questions and requests.3 New You Should Know

If journalists can satisfy Apple, Apple will treat them in a friendly and human way. While if the newsmen make mistakes or hurt Apple`s feeling, then Apple will try its best to make the newsmen shut up. This is the system of Apple, and it runs very well till now. If the newsmen want to contact with Apple, then they had better do not let Apple down.
